title: Bug 22604[Preferences] Incorrect @see in PreferenceStore javadoc
OB: Build 2.0In the javadoc for the default constructor of PreferenceStore, it contains thefollowing:@see load(java.io.InputStream)@see store(java.io.InputStream)I believe the second one should be:@see save(OutputStream, String)Likewise, the other constructor refers to store() instead of save().
EB: Build 2.0In the javadoc for the default constructor of PreferenceStore, it contains thefollowing:@see load(java.io.InputStream)@see store(java.io.InputStream)I believe the second one should be:@see save(OutputStream, String)Likewise, the other constructor refers to store() instead of save().
